name: mri binarize
author: Nipype (interface)
description:
mri_binarize, as implemented in Nipype (module: nipype.interfaces.freesurfer.model, interface: mri_binarize).
Use FreeSurfer mri_binarize to threshold an input volume

inputs.name: Abs
inputs.description: A boolean. Take abs of invol first (ie, make unsigned).

inputs.name: Bin col num
inputs.description: A boolean. Set binarized voxel value to its column number.

inputs.name: Bin val
inputs.description: An integer. Set vox within thresh to val (default is 1).

inputs.name: Bin val not
inputs.description: An integer. Set vox outside range to val (default is 0).

inputs.name: Binary file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing a file. Binary output volume.

inputs.name: Count file
inputs.description: A boolean or a pathlike object or string representing a file. Save number of hits in ascii file (hits, ntotvox, pct).

inputs.name: Count file
inputs.description: A boolean or a pathlike object or string representing a file. Save number of hits in ascii file (hits, ntotvox, pct).

inputs.name: Dilate
inputs.description: An integer. Niters: dilate binarization in 3d.

inputs.name: Erode
inputs.description: An integer. Nerode: erode binarization in 3d (after any dilation).

inputs.name: Erode2d
inputs.description: An integer. Nerode2d: erode binarization in 2d (after any 3d erosion).

inputs.name: Frame no
inputs.description: An integer. Use 0-based frame of input (default is 0).

inputs.name: In file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Input volume.

inputs.name: Invert
inputs.description: A boolean. Set binval=0, binvalnot=1.

inputs.name: Mask file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Must be within mask.

inputs.name: Mask thresh
inputs.description: A float. Set thresh for mask.

inputs.name: Match
inputs.description: A list of items which are an integer. Match instead of threshold.

inputs.name: Max
inputs.description: A float. Max thresh.

inputs.name: Merge file
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing file. Merge with mergevol.

inputs.name: Min
inputs.description: A float. Min thresh.

inputs.name: Out type
inputs.description: 'nii' or 'nii.gz' or 'mgz'. Output file type.

inputs.name: Rmax
inputs.description: A float. Compute max based on rmax*globalmean.

inputs.name: Rmin
inputs.description: A float. Compute min based on rmin*globalmean.

inputs.name: Subjects dir
inputs.description: A pathlike object or string representing an existing directory. Subjects directory.

inputs.name: Ventricles
inputs.description: A boolean. Set match vals those for aseg ventricles+choroid (not 4th).

inputs.name: Wm
inputs.description: A boolean. Set match vals to 2 and 41 (aseg for cerebral wm).

inputs.name: Wm ven csf
inputs.description: A boolean. Wm and ventricular csf, including choroid (not 4th).

inputs.name: Zero edges
inputs.description: A boolean. Zero the edge voxels.

inputs.name: Zero slice edge
inputs.description: A boolean. Zero the edge slice voxels.

output-files.name: Count file
output-files.description: Ascii file containing number of hits.
